Sentencas: The electrochemical characteristics of composite cathodes made of (La, Sr)MnO3-(Zr, Se)O-2 (LSM-SSZ), modified with PrO2-x moderately additive, and designed for application in solid oxide fuel cells at I high temperatures were studied.
Titulo: Cathodes Based on (La, Sr)MnO3 Modified with PrO2-x

Sentencas: The relationship between activity of catalytically modified composite LSM-SSZ cathodes and dispersity of electrocatalyst was revealed.
Titulo: Cathodes Based on (La, Sr)MnO3 Modified with PrO2-x

Sentencas: The boundaries of the temperature range with the maximum dispersity of electrocatalyst and electrochemical activity of cathodes were found.
Titulo: Cathodes Based on (La, Sr)MnO3 Modified with PrO2-x

Sentencas: The composite LSM-SSZ cathodes modified with PrO2-x were shown inert with respect to oxidation reactions of hydrocarbon fuel (methane) and highly active electrochemically with respect to oxygen reaction in non-equilibrium gas mixture of CH4 and O-2.
Titulo: Cathodes Based on (La, Sr)MnO3 Modified with PrO2-x

Sentencas: In cells with (Ce, Sm)O-2 (SDC) and (Zr, Y)O-2 (YSZ) electrolytes, their overvoltage is below 80 mV at the current density about 0.5 A/cm(2) and temperature of 600 degrees C. These electrodes can be used as cathodes in single-chamber fuel cells.
Titulo: Cathodes Based on (La, Sr)MnO3 Modified with PrO2-x

Sentencas: Long-term experiments were carried out to study time stability of characteristics of the said composite cathodes.
Titulo: Cathodes Based on (La, Sr)MnO3 Modified with PrO2-x

Sentencas: The studied electrodes show parabolic or damped exponential time curves of polarization resistance if contacting with YSZ or SDC electrolyte, respectively.
Titulo: Cathodes Based on (La, Sr)MnO3 Modified with PrO2-x

Sentencas: According to the forecast based on the experimental regularities the polarization resistance of LSM-SSZ cathodes in 10,000 h will not exceed 0.4 or 0. 13
Titulo: Cathodes Based on (La, Sr)MnO3 Modified with PrO2-x

Sentencas: Ohm cm(2), respectively, if YSZ or SDC electrolyte is used.
Titulo: Cathodes Based on (La, Sr)MnO3 Modified with PrO2-x
